attributes.action: Vaccinate teachers before they return back to Schools
attributes.additional_details: The Government clearly said when schools became a "Covid-19 Hotspot" making this a risky environment for teachers to be in. Schools being back will cause a teacher to become more acceptable to catching the virus as children are prime carries of Covid-19. Teachers are fundamental in our society as they provide future economic growth to students and provide a service to our country that is essential. They deserve to have the same protection as Key-Workers.
attributes.background: The Government should mandate that teachers receive a Covid-19 vaccine before they are made to go back on the 8th of March.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572419.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
